title: FS $795 1907 New York Giants fold out postcard, Matty and 3 more HOFers
author: T206Jim

posts.post_title: FS $795 1907 New York Giants fold out postcard, Matty and 3 more HOFers
posts.post_content:
For sale is this 1907 New York Giants foldout schedule postcard.  Great action images and in very nice shape, all panels are attached and solid.  A seldom seen postcard.

$795 shipped PPFF.
